frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-all-ip-addresses
frozen.shortDescription: Show IP addresses for LAN, WAN IPv6 and VPN in the GNOME panel. Click on the address to cycle trough different interfaces.
frozen.longDescription: Show IP addresses for LAN, WAN IPv6 and VPN in the GNOME panel. Click on the address to cycle trough different interfaces.
